project_descr: The project aims to ensure that an early recovery approach is integrated into the humanitarian response, through strengthened capacity of the Global Cluster for Early Recovery -GCER) and relevant actors.

outputs.output_descr:
Note: This project was extended in light of new funding from ECHO for the period of 1st July 2014 - 30 June 2016.
This project's output were to strengthen corporate and inter-agency early recovery capacity and to develop relevant tools

document_name: Project Document -UNDP support to IASC CWGER
